Synopsis
========

``debops run`` [-h|--help] [--project-dir <project_dir>] [--eval] [--] <[<namespace>.<collection>/]playbook> [playbook] ... [<ansible_args>]

``debops check`` [-h|--help] [--project-dir <project_dir>] [--eval] [--] <[<namespace>.<collection>/]playbook> [playbook] ... [<ansible_args>]
